name: Con-Cat-Enate!
description:
Skyler just seems to be a magnet for balloons, and we're here to help out their shocking connection, and learn some typing at the same time!

Skyler will be moving around a room filled with balloons. To charge a balloon, type out the word you see above the chosen balloon. If Skyler reaches a balloon while it's charged, it will join onto him. Balloons lose charge over time, going from blue (charged) to red (not charged).

If Skyler reaches a balloon before it's charged, it will pop! Also, if you spell a word wrong, it will pop too!

Have 10 balloons combine with Skyler to win!

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam
